name: Hello World (itch) (imsamuka, MattUToo)
description:
A robot comes to our world, without his serial's number or even an memory disc.

Only a mission lives inside his mind; Find his creator, and with this, himself as well.

Help this lonely robot to go through the insides of what seems like an old and broken factory.
He may need to be cautious with his energy. Things isn't like when the world had plenty of it.

Controls:

Movement - Left, Right, Up and Down

Interaction - Spacebar or X

Pause - P or ESC

Skip level - TAB (it was a bug, now it's a feature!)
